name: Mr. Heng Hongsea
title: A discussion with our Network Engineer
desc:
អ្នកទាំងអស់គ្នាដែលលឺពី DEV.Ops ដែរទេ? DEV.Ops ជារបៀបនៃការ Deploy Apps  ទៅកាន់ Serverដែលបង្កឲ្យមានភាពងាយស្រួលពីរយ៉ាង គឺ ការសម្រួលឲ្យ Developer ងាយស្រួលក្នុងការ Push Code ជំរុញឲ្យក្លាយជាផលិតផលសម្រេចឆាប់បានជោគជ័យ និងចំណាយពេលខ្លី។ ចង់ដឹងបន្ថែមទៀត កុំភ្លេចតាមដាន LIVE របស់យើងនៅថ្ងៃសៅរ៏ សប្តាហ៍នេះ ជាមួយក្រុមការងាររបស់យើងគឺ Mr. Hongsea ដែលជា Network Engineer នៅ KOOMPI។​​ កុំភ្លេចណា  ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍នេះ ទី ១៣ វេលាម៉ោង ៣ រសៀល។

Ever heard of DEV.Ops? DEV.Ops is an agile development practice that is used to deploy Apps to the server that provides benefits like helping developers to easily push the code and reach the production phase faster.

Hongsea is a young and competent Network Engineer. He is a sophomore at the Royal University of Phnom Penh. At KOOMPI, Hongsea designs and implements all infrastructure and network-related projects. Hongsea will go LIVE on Saturday the 13th at 3pm so tune in!

name: Mr.Hieng Kimhong
title: We answer every question related to KOOMPI from users
desc:
KOOMPI will host a live user AMA session at 5PM today. We will try our best to answer all user questions regarding KOOMPI hardware, software, and how KOOMPI can help you with your tasks. 

Our host this week is Mr.Hieng Kimhong. Kimhong is a young inspiring educator. He is a junior at the Royal University of Phnom Penh. At KOOMPI, Kimhong works on creating educational contents and he helps assist KOOMPI user's with all sorts of support. 

Simply leave a comment and our host will answer!

name: Mr. San Vuthy
title: ASK ME ANYTHING with a Full-stack Javascript Developer from KOOMPI
desc:
Do you want to start a career as a Full-stack Javascript Developer?

Join our live AMA (Ask Me Anything) at 3 PM today (June 20, 2020) to hear from KOOMPI's full-Stack Javascript developer Mr. San Vuthy. 

Vuthy is a very competent programmer, his work has been a great impact on our company and the whole community. Prepare your questions and ASK HIM ANYTHING!

name: Mr. Hieng Kimhong
title: Ask Anything About KOOMPI with Kimhong
desc: Join our live AMA to know all the fun things you can do with KOOMPI. Clear your doubts with any question you have in mind. This live event is held specifically for KOOMPI users and anyone who is interested in learning more about us. ASK US ANYTHING!!

name: Ms. Aing Sereyvathana
title: Ask a Linux Developer anything, with Sereyvathana
desc: This week, we have invited Sereyvathana, a Linux developer from KOOMPI to be our guest speaker. Stay tuned and prepare any questions in advance!!

name: Mr. Hieng Kimhong
title: A discussion about LibreOffice Calc & LibreOffice Impress
desc:
Introduction to LibreOffice Calc and LibreOffice Impress, two open-source office applications that are equivalent to Microsoft Excel and Microsoft Powerpoint. 
Join and ASK US ANYTHING.

name: Mr. Phal Brilliant
title: Learn about KOOMPI OS with Lead Linux Developer
desc: Ask our Lead Developer anything! Did you know that Brilliant is the “grandmaster” in the KOOMPI team? He is currently leading the OS department and actively working on new improvements. Don't forget to tune in!

name: Mr. Phal Happy
title: CG & VFX AT KOOMPI
desc: Our host this week is Happy Phal. Happy is a CG & VFX inspring artist. He is working on creating and building all 3D assets for KOOMPI. As a 3D designer, he using open-source softwares to build all his task and animation.

name: Mr. Thul Rithy
title: 45 minutes with Rithy Thul, Co-founder of KOOMPI
desc: Rithy is a leading light in the Cambodian and southeast Asian entrepreneurial and social innovation sector. His SmallWorld venture, started in 2011, was Cambodia’s first-ever co-working space. SmallWorld now provides space, mentorship, and capital investment for young teams looking to start and scale start-up ventures.

name: Mr. You Panha
title: Ask me anything with Panha You, Sale and Supply Chain Officer at KOOMPI
desc: Our AMA speaker this week is Panha, Sales and Supply Chain Officer at KOOMPI. Watch our Livestream this weekend to hear about his experience and drop your questions.

name: Mr. Seang Hengsrun
title: KOOMPI's basic command with Hengsrun
desc:
For KOOMPI User AMA this week, we are taking everyone on a Basic Command tour on our official user manual website, koompi.org. 

Our host Hengsrun handles community support in the KOOMPI Community telegram group. He is also the person behind all documentations on koompi.org. Hengsrun is currently studying two majors, IT at RUPP and BA at IFL.

name: Mr. Corn Daveat
title: Mobile App Development with Daveat
desc: Join our AMA this Saturday to ask Daveat, mobile app developer at Selendra. Ask Daveat anything about mobile app development and his current project at Selendra.

name: Ms. Ou Chandara
title: What it's like to use KOOMPI with Chandara
desc: Our AMA is a little more special this week! We'd like to introduce you to Ou Chandara from Testing Studio! Chandara has been using KOOMPI for her office work as a senior HR officer in Testing Studio. We are inviting her to share her experience and review of the device. Don't miss this episode! Set a reminder for Wednesday!
